        public void getColor(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        The method calls a pop-up window for choosing a Color, and afterwards sets the
        -fx-background-color:
        of the root of JavaFXApp in the .css file.
        Parameters:
        event - the ActionEvent of pressing the button.
